definition: large inscribed stele/fig. great achievement/imperishable masterpiece
a monument/an upright stone tablet/stele/CL:塊|块[kuai4],面[mian4]

sentences.english: Li Wei makes person unknown in daily life as an eternal monument to sculpture.
sentences.chinese: 黎薇是將日常生活中的無名者作爲永恆的豐碑來雕刻。

sentences.english: Premier Zhou's illustrious deeds are an everlasting monument in the hearts of the Chinese people.
sentences.chinese: 周總理的光輝業績在中國人民心中立下了不朽的豐碑。

sentences.english: It rose as a monument to human ingenuity immovably firm.
sentences.chinese: 它有如人類智慧的豐碑，巍然屹立，巋然不動。

sentences.english: Daisaku Ikeda's Proposals is a monument in the history of Sino-Japanese relations.
sentences.chinese: 《池田倡言》是中日關係史上的一座豐碑。

sentences.english: The tireless -pursuit spirit of Olympic athletes has set a model for each of us.
sentences.chinese: 奧運健兒不懈的追求給我們每一個人樹立了一道豐碑。

sentences.english: The monuments of men's ancestors were the most impressive exhortations.
sentences.chinese: 先輩們的豐碑最能奮勉人心的。

sentences.english: This book is a monumental work worthy of China's new cultural movement.
sentences.chinese: 這部著作不愧爲中國新文化運動的豐碑。

sentences.english: DO NOT STOP" – with the monumental mountainscape of the Kenai Peninsula looming across the bay.
sentences.chinese: 克奈半島豐碑式的羣山景色在海灣對面時隱時現。
現在，奈保爾有了他豐碑式的正傳。

sentences.english: Shaoshan Irrigation Area building is a worthy monument of history.
sentences.chinese: 韶山灌區的建設不愧是一座歷史的豐碑。

sentences.english: Build one office project, cultivate a monument.
sentences.chinese: 建一處工程，樹一座豐碑。

sentences.english: And there was no monument to the machine-age like America.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比美國更稱得上是機器時代的豐碑了。

sentences.english: Hippos are monuments to the glories of mud.
sentences.chinese: 淤泥灘中，就此矗立起活的豐碑。

sentences.english: This is the young man who's become a monument.
sentences.chinese: 這就是後來成爲了豐碑的年輕人。

definition: to follow the past and herald the future (idiom); part of a historical transition/forming a bridge between earlier and later stages
guard home, defend the country (idiom); national defense
see 承前啟後|承前启后[cheng2 qian2 qi3 hou4]
